rex_tmx_importer_v2.name: TMX Importer v2
rex_tmx_importer_v2.description: Create sprites according to tmx exported file.

oneachtilecell1.description: Triggered when retrieving each available tile cell.

oneachobject2.description: Triggered when retrieving each avaiable object on 'object layer'.

foreachlayerproperty10.description: Repeat the event for each layer property.

foreachtilesetproperty11.description: Repeat the event for each tileset property.

foreachtileproperty12.description: Repeat the event for each tile property.

foreachmapproperty13.description: Repeat the event for each map property.

foreachlayer14.description: Repeat the event for each layer.

foreachobjectproperty15.description: Repeat the event for each object property.

foreachtileatlxy31.list-name: For each tile at logic XY
foreachtileatlxy31.description: Repeat the event for each tile at logic XY.

createtiles2.description: Retrieve tile array and creating tiles. It will trigger "Condition:On each tile cell".

retrievetilearray7.description: Retrieve tile array. It will trigger "Condition:On each tile cell"

x0.name: X
x0.desc: X co-ordinate of instance at Logic(0,0).

y1.name: Y
y1.desc: Y co-ordinate of instance at Logic(0,0).

createtilesduration20.description: Retrieve tile array and creating tiles in a duration. It will trigger "Condition:On each tile cell".

processing_time1.name: Processing time
processing_time1.desc: Processing time per tick in percentage. A tick time is (1/60), 1 is using full tick time.

retrievetilearrayduration21.list-name: Retrieve tile array in a duration
retrievetilearrayduration21.display-text: Retrieve tile array in a duration {0}
retrievetilearrayduration21.description: Retrieve tile array in a duration. It will trigger "Condition:On each tile cell"

processing_time0.name: Processing time
processing_time0.desc: Processing time per tick in percentage. A tick time is (1/60), 1 is using full tick time.

resettilemap51.description: Reset tilemap by tile array of a layer.

mapwidth1.description: Get map width in tile number.

mapheight2.description: Get map height in tile number.

logicx12.description: Get logic X index of created instance.

logicy13.description: Get logic Y index of created instance.

layerprop14.description: Get layer properties of created instance. Add second parameters to set default value.

tilesetprop15.description: Get tileset properties of created instance.  Add second parameters to set default value.

tileprop16.description: Get tile properties of created instance.  Add second parameters to set default value.

physicalx17.description: Get physical X position (in pixel) of created instance.

physicaly18.description: Get logic Y position (in pixel) of created instance.

layername19.description: Get layer name of created instance.

layeropacity20.description: Get layer opacity of created instance.

ınstuıd23.description: Get instance UID created by "Action:Create tiles".

frame24.description: Get frame number, , add GID at 1st parameter to get frame number of that tile.

tilesetname25.description: Get tileset name, add GID at 1st parameter to get tileset name of that tile.

mapprop26.description: Get map properties. Add second parameters to set default value.

curlayerpropname30.description: Get the name of current layer property in a For Each loop.

curlayerpropvalue31.description: Get the value of current layer property in a For Each loop.

curtilesetpropname32.description: Get the name of current tileset property in a For Each loop.

curtilesetpropvalue33.description: Get the value of current tileset property in a For Each loop.

curtilepropname34.description: Get the name of current tile property in a For Each loop.

curtilepropvalue35.description: Get the value of current tile property in a For Each loop.

curmappropname36.description: Get the name of current map property in a For Each loop.

curmappropvalue37.description: Get the value of current map property in a For Each loop.

curobjectpropname38.description: Get the name of current object property in a For Each loop.

curobjectpropvalue39.description: Get the value of current object property in a For Each loop.

objgroupwidth41.description: Get area width of object group.

objgroupheight42.description: Get area height of object group.

objectprop56.description: Get object properties.  Add second parameters to set default value.

objectpx57.description: Get physical X position (in pixel) of object.

objectpy58.description: Get physical Y position (in pixel) of object.

objectrotation60.description: Get rotation of object, in degrees clockwise.

objectrefgıd61.description: Get gid of a reference tile.

ısup2down111.description: Return 1 if current hexagon map is up2down layout.

ısındent112.description: Return 1 if current hexagon map is indent first line.
